original_text: And Jahath was the chief, and Zizah the second: but Jeush and Beriah had not many sons; therefore they were in one reckoning, according to their father's house.
korean_text: 그 우두머리는 야핫이요 그 다음은 시사며 여우스와 브리아는 아들이 많지 아니하므로 그들과 한 조상의 가문으로 계수되었더라

sentences.original_text: but Jeush and Beriah had not many sons;
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 여우스와 베리아는 아들이 많지 않았으며

sentences.original_text: therefore they were in one reckoning,
